TopicTitle: Undocking caused collisions not working and heat bars showing

Articles.Content:
KSP Version:

0.1.2.0.22258

    Operating System and version:

Windows 11


CPU : Intel(R) Core(TM) i5-10400F CPU @ 2.90GHz, 2904 Mhz, 6 Cores, 12 Logical Processor(s)
GPU: NVIDIA GeForce GTX 1650 SUPER


Undocking caused some issues


    Steps to Replicate:

1.  undock something

    Fixes / Workarounds (if known..)

None I know of

Crafts clipping without collision. Quick saving and loading did nothing. Also free floating struts

 

 

 

After engine plume hit other craft, temperature gauges shown. After a quick load and free struts are gone

 

Also, the game thought the two crafts were still connected. The tracking station shown the craft as one even though I undocked.

Game froze my PC when I attempted to destroy craft, had to restart

 

No mods or file modifications
